title: Whats the Difference between a fed Riven, and a feeding Riven
body:
The team she's yelling at.
https://m.popkey.co/7e1062/jWxqe.gif

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=KANY3 EUWEST,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UxJYP1gt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-20T02:03:42.060+0000)
>
> Sigh. Can confirm.

I feel the same...

You're right! On the rare occasion that I play Riven, I end up feeding and yelling at everyone. I yell things such as these:
"WHY AM I SO BAD!?"
"What was I thinking? This is horrible!"
"I'M 0/6 STOP GANKING ME"
"How did you do that?"
"WHAT AM I EVEN DOING"
"Why did I choose Riven over Yorick?"
"DON'T I LOOK PRETTY!? Oh wait, I'm a corpse again..."
"Clearly, I got this skin from chests"
"Float like a butterfly, fall like a brick."
"I am WAAAAAAAY too good at this game."
"SO MANY SKILLS"
"OH MY GOD I'M SO SORRY THAT KILL WON'T HELP ME AT ALL"

> "Float like a butterfly, fall like a brick

Not going to lie, that was hilarious

Although if it were more traditionally directed Riven salt:

{{champion:92}}: Float like a butterfly, sting like a -
{{champion:64}}: \*punches Riven once\*
{{champion:92}}: THAT'S IT YOU LITTLE \*\*\*\* GONNA END YOU \*\*\*\* PIECE OF \*\*\*\* BLIND\*\*\* \*\*\*\*FACED \*\*\*\*\*\*\* !@#$!@!!!!!!!!!!
Muhammad Ali: That's... that's not how it works.

> Muhammad Ali: That's... that's not how it works.

Rest in peace
When I play katarina I always apologize to the support for getting fed off of them :(
I apologize to bot lane in general cus they get them low and I just KS. Sometimes I even flash for KS, so rude of me :(
Honestly playing kat pre-20 minutes is 95% ks-ing.

> Honestly playing kat is 95% ks-ing.

FTFY
This also applies to Vayne mains.

Vayne is toxic in a way different way, its more like they need everything to become a god and the fact that they can become a god and also need every single cs and kill makes them toxic but i bet most vayne players are not toxic when playing other champs.

I really noticed that wwith vayne mains. Anyone else, you accidentally hit a cs while moving or using an aoe, they dont bat an eye. Vayne mains on the other hand if you hit a minion, even if you dont kill it they start flipping shit in chat.
"Get me to late game or gg afk"
Also to the mastery 6 garen mains that spam emotes then brag at every turn. Yeah so much skill required ERROR 404: LOGIC NOT FOUND
I have not encountered a Garen main yet, or even a mastery 5 Garen for that matter. I'm in Silver IV so mains are still kinda rare.
i find them way to often my friend and none of them are fun to be around even on your team.

Only once have a found a garen main, his match history was garen and ren.... it is the most annoying thing ever! he plays him so much that he knows the most effective way to play him is the most annoying way to play him. tbh even the champ design shouts out "im brain dead". garen as a character is really stupid when i see garen i think of someone who is a complete failure but was born w/ super strength. his looks and voice just out right say i have 0 intelligence and getting killed to a champ that seems like he is designed to say i have no skill, and just how to dumb garen sounds... its super tilting. but yeah getting bay bladed and hit by a true damge point and click is also stupid
its just..... so.... ANNOYING! I don't enjoy a game if my only goal is to avoid dying to that lack of skill garen mains.
In a one4all, I found a duo, both with lvl 7 garens.

Anyone who's played with a riven before that's reading this post:
https://images.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=http%3A%2F%2Fi1.2pcdn.com%2Fnode14%2Fimage%2Farticle%2F201404%2F07%2F20140407234721a0dr64a7ac76wtvn.jpg&f=1

All these riven threads are making my stomach spin

I feel Noxus...
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/enough-internet.gif
Take the upvote {{summoner:21}}

In 22 hours this has become one of the most upvoted threads in the history of M&G
Probably nowhere near the top 10 but it's pretty high up there
https://media.giphy.com/media/xeXEpUVvAxCV2/giphy.gif

I got this post to 200 upvotes for you
https://media.giphy.com/media/lijh8d3TTXuU0/giphy.gif

Got on just to like this... And then proceeded to share it with all of my friends...

Btw? Did I mention the only friend I have is myself. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
YES LOL.
Lmao

A fed Riven tells everyone how great he or she is.  A feeding Riven tells everyone how bad they are.   

A fed Riven is still playing the game after 10 minutes.  A feeding Riven has disconnected by then.
I never yell at my team! Though I do feed a lot 8(
That is true :^)
